description: Amazon Web Services oformio grupu stručnjaka koja se svakodnevno bavi uticajem veštačke inteligencije na rad ovog cloud servisa

author: Dina Bass, Bloomberg
title: It's official: Microsoft is investing $10 billion in ChatGPT company OpenAI as the bot takes the internet by storm
description: The chatbot has lit up the internet for months and could be a major turning point for AI.

author: Kyle Barr
title: The Year Ahead in Generative AI
description: At this very moment, I could boot up OpenAI’s popular ChatGPT and ask it to write this article for me. Or I could ask it to “write a lullaby about a cool goose who just wants to honk.” I could pull up Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL-E 2, or any number of AI art generators and order it to craft me an portrait of…Read more...
